info.description: An API that retrieves entity artwork from Itunes api. Caches and returns in easier format.
info.title: Itunes Artwork API Proxy

get.description: Add search url params search Itunes for album artwork.

parameters.description: return only artwork by artist with name
parameters.name: artist

parameters.description: search for albums that match title
parameters.name: title

parameters.description: the size in px of the width and height
parameters.name: size

404.description: unable to find artwork for supplied artist and album

502.description: an error has occurred whilst trying to contact itunes
